features: 【Waterproof & Professional Laptop Bag】:The womens laptop bag is made of high-quality cross pattern PU leather and high-density nylon lining.it is water-resistant,scratch-resistant, wear-resistant and anti-wrinkle,easy to clean.Stretchable Key Fob Hook inside the shoulder bag can help get your keys easily,save your time.Reinforced flat bottom with 4 rivets will reduce friction and scrape of bottom of the ladies office bag,It lasts longer than other women computer tote bags

【Ideal Organizer Work Tote】:The work bags for women come with multi-compartments to meet all your work needs well. The laptop tote bag has an independent laptop compartment fits under 15.6 inch laptop and Ipad/tablet,a large main middle pocket designed for documents, book and gadgets,two small square pockets, two pen pockets,There has two side-pocket for power bank and water bottle inside.Stylish outer pocket with magnetic buckle,two zipper pockets and an anti-theft pocket,Easy access to items.

【Versatile Computer Bags for Women】:External USB port makes it easy to charge your phone while walking, or shopping,both which personalize your styles and retain a sense of chic. This womens laptop tote has length adjustable shoulder strap and handle, is suitable for different body type.The leather bags for women is ideal for daily use at shopping, office, college, business trip, school,travel etc.Perfect gift choice for anniversary, birthday, Mother's Day, Valentine's Day and Christmas.

【Perfect Size Womens Briefcase】: Size of the laptop bag is 16.9"Lx6"Wx12"H, finished with a secure zip-top closure. With a removable shoulder strap varied from 28.3 inches to maximum 49 inches and adjustable handles, You be carried in several ways as a ladies briefcase,teacher tote bag, computer bag for women or women crossbody work bag as well, convenient and comfortable.

【Additional Clutch Bag】:One more gift is a 8.7" L x 5.3" H detachable clutch purse. The additional small bag is made of soft PU leather, has smooth zippper on top closure, polyester lining inside. The purse can store change, snacks, glasses, earphones, passports, keys and cell phones.This bundle is the best gift for wife, girlfriend, mom ,daughter, families and friends

Waterproof Laptop Bag Fits 15.6 inch This lady's laptop bag is made of cross pattern PU leather, so the handbag can be completely waterproof. With the security of a Waterproof bag will protecting the contents of the shoulder bag on a wet day or surface, and ensure that your stuff safe and dry in a rainstorm. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality work bag
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my girlfriend to replace her previous computer bag. She loves the color and quality. It has been holding up well, and has plenty of space for her computer and other work essentials.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, functional, and styish
reviews.reviewText: It has slots for documents, a laptop, charging port, and small pockets for misc. Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I never had the need for a laptop carrier because I didn't carry my laptop out of the house. I bought a very expensive laptop and in the last 6 months I have traveled a few times and carried my laptop wrapped in a towel in a backpack. I wasn't comfortable with it but needed to bring it with me. After my last trip I decided to purchase a carrier. I first purchased one that fit it perfectly but it wasn't cute and when I ordered it I didn't take in account that I needed to carry my laptop cooler as well. There wasn't room for anything besides the laptop. I returned it and searched for a tote bag specifically. I found this beauty! I got the maroon and black bag and I LOVE it!!! It fits my laptop, the cooler, and all of my cords with some room for a couple of other things. It's also extremely durable. I don't mind the weight of it probably because I never carried one for comparison. I don't know how I lived without it. Did I mention it's beautiful? Lol. I would buy again but hopefully that time is far far away.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute feminine laptop bag
reviews.reviewText: I wanted a nice feminine laptop bag that is not the usual bags that everyone carries around. It's nice and sturdy. I love the pockets that it have but I do wish there was a interior zipper pocket that I can put my wallet or keys in.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It's gorgeous! The quality is really nice for the price. I recommend storing upright and with the dust bag. But I love it. Holds my laptop and portable monitor well and sooo much space for items that are in my purse so that I'm not caring 2 bags. It an get heavy so use the cross body for sturdiness. Makes me feel fancy with my new bag!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This bag is huge! But is exactly what I needed. I'm a full time student and I work as well. Sometimes I don't feel like carrying my backpack to my workplace especially when I have meetings. I don't want to leave my backpack inside my car because I fear a break in (it happened before and they took my laptop 😭) Thus, this bag looks more professional whenever I have classes before or after work. My laptop fits perfectly! Books, makeup , pens , wallet etc. It is very big and lots of pockets. It is very stylish and elegant as well. It comes with a little purse which I plan to use it as a makeup bag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute, great quality
reviews.reviewText: I love this bag. It is made very well, and the pockets are perfect size and it is easy to access everything. I have a macbook air 15 inch and it fits perfectly. :) 10/10!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Professional build with Style! Highly Recommend!
reviews.reviewText: This bag looks like it should cost a fortune. It holds half my office! I can put my laptop and probably 2 reams of paper inside. Long enough for legal sheets. Zipper closure is great! Large pouch inside, two snap closures outside, I just love it. I get so many compliments! It comes with two different lengths of straps, and an external USB port. Surpassed my expectations. The itty bitty gem was just a nice touch that really made me smile when I found it (but it popped off the first day--quick fix though)!If you are looking at it, get it. Won't disappoint!
